mapper.select: select count(status) totalUsedCount from coupon where rulerId=#{id} and status="1" group by status
select count(status) totalUnusedCount from coupon where rulerId=#{id} and status="2" group by status
select count(status) totalUnusedCount from coupon where ownerId=#{id} and status="2" group by status
select c.account,ca.id,ca.consumerId,ca.consumptionTime from consumer c,coupon_application ca where ca.merchantId=#{id} and ca.status="2" and ca.consumerId=c.id

select c.account,cpa.applicationTime,cpa.applicationCode,coupon.couponValue from consumer as c,coupon_pay_application as cpa,coupon where cpa.merchantId=#{id} and cpa.status="0" and cpa.consumerId=c.id and cpa.couponId=coupon.id order by c.account
select * from coupon where ownerId=#{value} and status="0"
select cpa.consumerId,cpa.couponId,c.couponValue,cpa.consumeValue,cpa.applicationTime from coupon_pay_application cpa,coupon c where applicationCode=#{value} and cpa.couponId=c.id
mapper.update: update coupon set status="3" where rulerId=#{id} and status="0"
mapper.select: select sum(couponValue) from coupon where rulerId=#{id} and status="0"
select * from coupon_ruler where merchantId = #{merchantId} and status = '1'

select t1.id AS couponId, t1.couponValue AS amount, t1.consumptionDate AS obtainDate, t2.validStartDate AS validityFrom, t2.validEndDate AS validityTo from coupon AS t1, coupon_ruler AS t2 where ownerId=#{consumerId} and #{consumptionAmount} >= t2.reach t1.rulerId = t2.id and t1.status = "2"
mapper.update: update coupon set status="1" where id=#{couponId}
mapper.select: select consumptionValue from coupon where contractAddress=#{value}
select id from coupon where contractAddress=#{value}
select sum(coupon.couponValue) from coupon, coupon_pay_application as cpa where cpa.consumerId =#{consumerId} and cpa.couponId = coupon.id and cpa.status='1'
select sum(coupon.couponValue) from coupon, coupon_migration as cm where cm.fromId =#{consumerId} and cm.couponId = coupon.id
select status from coupon where contractAddress=#{value}
